edu.drexel.cs.ai.othello

Class OthelloPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.drexel.cs.ai.othello.OthelloPlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExampleOthelloPlayer, HumanOthelloPlayer, IngramOthelloPlayer, RandomOthelloPlayer

    public abstract class OthelloPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the API for othello-playing agents. Here is an example of a simple random othello-playing agent (see RandomOthelloPlayer): 

    public class RandomOthelloPlayer extends OthelloPlayer {
    public RandomOthelloPlayer(String name) {
        super(name);
    }

    public Square getMove(GameState currentState, Date deadline) {
        Square moves[] = currentState.getValidMoves().toArray(new Square[0]);
        int next = currentState.getRandom().nextInt(moves.length);
        log("Randomly moving to " + moves[next].toString() + "...");
        return moves[next];
    }
}

    Author:
    Evan A. Sultanik

    • Method Detail

      • getMove

        public abstract Square getMove(GameState currentState,
             java.util.Date deadline)
        Returns the move chosen by this player given the current game state. deadline is the time by which this function must return. If deadline is null, there is no deadline.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this player.

      • registerCurrentBestMove

        protected final void registerCurrentBestMove(Square bestMove)
                                      throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Register's the best move the agent has found so far in its search. If the agent runs out of time, this is the move that will be used for the agent. If no move is registered and the agent misses its deadline, then a move will be chosen at random.
        Parameters:
        bestMove - The best move that the agent has found so far.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if getMove(GameState, Date) is not currently being run, or if it is being run from a different thread.

      • getCurrentBestMove

        protected final Square getCurrentBestMove()
        Returns The best move that the agent has found so far, as registered using registerCurrentBestMove(Square). If no move has been registered, or if getMove(GameState, Date) is not currently running, then null is returned.

      • getMillisUntilDeadline

        protected final long getMillisUntilDeadline()
        Utility function for returning the number of milliseconds remaining until the deadline.

      • log

        protected void log(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a log message to the user interface.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this player.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
